3.0.name: wordpress/private-community-for-bp-lite
3.0.description: Makes BP and bbPress pages private and only accessable to logged in users with the exception of the pages you set in Dashboard/Settings/PrivateCommunityBP. This version allows 10 unblocked pages and has not been tested for use with multisite installations. You can unblock pages like activity, or members but not profiles. Blocks RSS feeds to logged out visitors.
